Segment.name: ATR
Segment.comment: To report individual animal test results

Field.name: TestTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of test performed for which measured results will be reported

Field.name: TestPeriodOrIntervalValue
Field.comment: Numeric value of period or interval signifying when a test event occurs

Field.name: UnitOfTimePeriodOrInterval
Field.comment: Code indicating the time period or interval

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

Field.name: NonNumericTestValue
Field.comment: Identifies a non-numeric value for a test result

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: SurfaceLayerPositionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the product surface, layer or position that is being described

Field.name: Time
Field.comment: Time expressed in 24-hour clock time as follows: HHMM, or HHMMSS, or HHMMSSD, or HHMMSSDD, where H = hours (00-23), M = minutes (00-59), S = integer seconds (00-59) and DD = decimal seconds; decimal seconds are expressed as follows: D = tenths (0-9) and DD = hundredths (00-99)
